title: Array method
extract: Joins all elements of an array into a string. Returns the last (greatest) index of an element within the array equal to the specified value, or -1 if none is found. Extracts a section of an array and returns a new array.Jan 8, 2019
extract_html: Joins all elements of an array into a string. Returns the last (greatest) index of an element within the array equal to the specified value, or -1 if none is found. Extracts a section of an array and returns a new array.Jan 8, 2019
